Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

◆ PLCrashReporterPostCrashSignalCallback

typedef void(* PLCrashReporterPostCrashSignalCallback) (siginfo_t *info, ucontext_t *uap, void *context)

Prototype of a callback function used to execute additional user code with signal information as provided by PLCrashReporter. Called upon completion of crash handling, after the crash report has been written to disk.

Parameters
infoThe signal info.
uapThe crash's threads context.
contextThe API client's supplied context value.
See also
The Async-Safe Programming Guide documentation.
